meanings.definition: A white or yellow crystalline compound, C10H8O, used in the manufacture of dyes and perfumes.
meanings.sent1: The naphthol added a pleasant scent to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: The artist used naphthol to create vibrant colors in the dye.
meanings.sent3: The naphthol in the dye whispered to the fabric, 'I will make you beautiful.'
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like naphthol spreading through water.
meanings.sent5: The naphthol sparkled like tiny crystals in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of isomeric hydroxyl derivatives of naphthalene.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the different naphthol derivatives under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Naphthol derivatives are commonly used in various chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The naphthol derivatives threw a party and invited all the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like naphthol derivatives, branching out in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The naphthol derivatives danced together in perfect harmony.
